name: visa-direct-sdk-cursor-pack-v2
description: Visa Direct SDK & Orchestrator with DevX Surface

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:simulator" "npm run dev:surface" "npm run dev:docs"
scripts.dev:py: cd python-sdk && python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -e .
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:py && npm run build:surface
scripts.test: npm run test:ts && npm run test:py
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd typescript-sdk && npm install && cd ../visa-direct-surface && npm install
scripts.live:ts: bash -lc 'source .env.current && cd typescript-sdk && npm run build && node dist/examples/live_sandbox_fi_to_card.js'
scripts.live:test: npm run live:ts && npm run live:py
scripts.pilot:ts: bash -lc 'source .env.current && cd typescript-sdk && npm run build && node dist/examples/universal_pilot.js'
scripts.pilot:domestic: bash -lc 'source .env.current && cd typescript-sdk && npm run build && node dist/examples/gb_domestic_pilot.js'
scripts.pilot:crossborder: bash -lc 'source .env.current && cd typescript-sdk && npm run build && node dist/examples/gb_ph_pilot.js'

author: Visa Direct Team
